text: Looks amazing! Beats my efforts! Good effort on getting a job, you can’t beat that independence but I appreciate how it makes juggling everything that bit more difficult! That said, you’ll be juggling like that for a lot of years yet, so it’s good to learn it early!

And no worries on activity, it’s a marathon not a sprint. I’m the same, work has been unusually busy recently so happy to just progress at a relaxed pace. I’ll be in touch shortly on the first chunk of what I sent above, maybe at the same time we can explore what particularly interests you about your studies, what you know about the profession, etc, etc as we go along, to make it a bit more relevant...

Yes sure we can connect whenever you can find time and I still have 2 deadlines which are due tomorrow. Most importantly, I would like to explore more on management and corporate finance. When you explained a bit, it kinda make sense as half of it i have already done in my work.
